attribute.name: IsMerchandiseItemUnlocked
IsMerchandisePlayerItemUnlocked

attribute.default: // all ticket levels are currently unlocked true;

attribute.name: HandleStaffProbation
UpdateLeagueWeeklySharedRevenue
attribute.default: SalaryInfo.WeeklySharedRevenue = SalaryInfo.TeamSharedRevenuePerYear[SeasonInfo.CurrentYear] / SeasonManager.GetTotalYearLength();

attribute.name: InitImproveTeamRequest
IssueImproveTeamRequest
attribute.default: TeamNeeds_ImproveTeamRequest request = BuildImproveTeamRequest(Team); TeamRequestManager.Issue(Team, request);

attribute.name: CPUCutPlayersDescription
attribute.default: Set to MANUAL if you want to control which players get cut during the preseason. Set to AUTO to let the CPU handle this activity for you.

attribute.name: CPUDraftPlayersDescription
attribute.default: When set to ON, the CPU will automatically sign draft picks for you.

attribute.name: CPUFillRosterDescription
attribute.default: When set to ON, the CPU will automatically sign free agents for positions that do not have the minimum number of required players.

attribute.name: CPUProgressPlayersDescription
attribute.default: When set to ON, the CPU will automatically progress your team's players throughout the season.

attribute.name: CPUResignPlayersDescription
attribute.default: Set to MANUAL if you want to control re-signing of your players. Set to AUTO to let the CPU handle this activity for you.

attribute.name: CPUSignOffSeasonDescription
attribute.default: Set to MANUAL if you want to bid on free agents during the offseason. Set to AUTO to let the CPU handle this activity for you.

attribute.name: InjuryManagementDescription
attribute.default: Set to MANUAL if you want to decide when to play injured players and place players on injured reserve (IR). Set to AUTO to let the CPU handle this activity for you.

attribute.name: ManualAdvancementDescription
attribute.default: Set to MANUAL to control week and draft advancement. Set to AUTO to automatically advance each time after you play your game or make a draft pick.

attribute.name: ScoutCollegePlayersDescription
attribute.default: Set to MANUAL if you want to scout college players and build your draft board to use in the upcoming draft. Set to AUTO to let the CPU handle this activity for you.

attribute.name: SeasonExperienceDescription
attribute.default: Full Control gives you the complete Franchise experience, while Simple lets you play through a season quickly game by game.

attribute.name: TradeAndFreeAgencyDescription
attribute.default: Set to MANUAL if you want to improve your team using trades and free agency throughout the season.

attribute.name: TutorialPopupDescription
attribute.default: When disabled, tutorial popups will not show up.

attribute.name: WeeklyTrainingDescription
attribute.default: Set to MANUAL if you want to head to the practice field each week to train your players. Set to AUTO to let the CPU handle this activity for you.

attribute.name: CalculateHistoricSuccessComponentValue
attribute.default: int historicWinWeighted = ((historicStats.SUPERBOWLWINS * 9 + historicStats.SUPERBOWLSMADE * 7 + historicStats.CONFERENCECHAMPS * 5 + historicStats.PLAYOFFSMADE * 3 + historicStats.WINS * 2 + historicStats.TIES * 1) / 6); historicWinWeighted;
